name: Skwovet
description: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
abilities.description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
